title: House Hearing on COVID-19 Vaccine Hesitancy
description: Former U.S. Surgeon General Jerome Adams along with other doctors testified on combating vaccine hesitancy before the House Coronavirus Crisis Select Subcommittee. They spoke about ways to encourage people to get vaccinated, including getting full FDA approval for the COVID-19 vaccines, offering targeted lotteries to unvaccinated communities, and mandating vaccines through workplaces, schools, and universities. Actress and activist Sophia Bush also testified.
